Posts.Content: On Aug 07, 2014 4:56 PM janr888 wrote:  I would just like to second this post , solid helpfull advice , thanks , artfull dodger , i take a big dose phytoplankton capsules, Two Q10 a day, lots of vitamin d, vitamin C and have eaten ground lemon skins ( frozen organic, washed and grate the skin every day into shakes and on cereal or alike} and on top of that no pop, lots of very good filtered water. I have AML and just started back  a drug for it and may have to cut the dailly pill in half because of side of effects.It effects your sexual fuuction, your BP and your tired more than normal but i try to still golf, not easy but i am doing it.
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...
